title: 12926 Ironstone Way Apt 303
posting_body: This beautiful 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo has 990 square feet of living space, and is located near Parker and Stroh Road.

This condo has a great layout, with a full living room and dining room, as well as a great kitchen with a spacious pantry, and all appliances, including a refrigerator, microwave, stove, dishwasher, and garbage disposal.
This condo is also equipped with air conditioning, a gas fireplace, ceiling fans, walk-in closets, vaulted ceilings, a great balcony, and a laundry room with a washer and dryer in the unit!
You will have access to the community pool, clubhouse, and fitness center.
Great location in Stroh Ranch in Parker, Backs up against Cherry Creek Bike Path which will go all the way into Downtown.
Less than 10 min drive to Downtown Parker.
Nearby schools include Legacy point elementary, Sagewood  Middle School & Ponderosa High School.
Trash is included in the rent!
1 Dog allowed with owner approval and pet deposit!
